en.name: Earth Shaker
en.passiveDescription: After a party member triggers a Pyro-related reaction, the equipping character’s Elemental Skill DMG is increased by {{16//20//24//28//32%}} for 8s. This effect can be triggered even when the triggering party member is not on the field.

zh.name: 撼地者
zh.passiveDescription: 队伍中的角色触发火元素相关反应后，装备者元素战技造成的伤害提升{{16//20//24//28//32%}}，持续8秒。该效果队伍中的角色处于队伍后台时也能触发。
